data.message: I love billy squire my son loves you. Too funny cuz I raised him listening to billy now we love your songs together!  Marshal Mathers. Do you remember calling me at 3am from California to New Hampshire? Hahaha I told you never to call and make me think one of my kids had n emergency in the middle of the night. Lol when my daughter came home in the am I said who the hell uses marshals anymore aren't they cops or sheriffs? I said what the hell trouble you get in some marshal calling at 3am. She said WHAT THE HELLA RE YOU TALKING ABOUT? I said a marshal Mathers called and she lhao she said that is Enimem. Lmao.
